name: Broken Record
description:
Broken Record is a Rhythm/Shoot-em-up mashup game.

The only objective is to survive the song without being hit by a bullet but the only way to improve your score is to play song notes in rhythm, which will make enemies fire more bullets at you.

Features:

  • 2 songs (including one tutorial)
  • Keyboard/Basic controller support
  • Players can create custom songs (PDF documentation in the game folder)
